value.title: StarCraft 2: Zerglings COUNTERING Void Rays? (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Two games of StarCraft 2 submitted by viewers. Some of the absolute worst StarCraft I've seen in a while... But a lot of fun! value.title: A Genius Strategy to a Dumb Challenge (Mouse ONLY)  | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged pros to play with their mouse only (no keyboards!) to see what a pro StarCraft 2 game looks like with such a ridiculous rule. value.title: How to beat the 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge (no, Beastyqt has not done it) #2 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs. After Spirit (Soul) tried it first, the next person brave enough to try it is PiLiPiLi, a Protoss player. He took on 7 Random insane AIs all on Any Build.
